Key Match Events: India beat Zimbabwe by 23 runs in the third T20I of the five-match series to go 2-1 up in the series.
Captain Shubman Gill top-scored with his innings of 66 (49).
Avesh Khan dismissed Wessly Madhevere in the second over.
Khaleel Ahmed got rid of Tadiwanashe Marumani for 13 (10).
Ravi Bishnoi took a sensational catch to dismiss Brian Bennett.
Washington Sundar took 3 wickets for 15 runs in four overs.
Dion Myers scored his maiden T20I fifty (65* off 49).
India posted a score of 182/4 in their allotted 20 overs.
Ruturaj Gaikwad added 72 runs for the third wicket with Shubman Gill.
Blessing Muzarabani and Sikandar Raza took two wickets each for Zimbabwe.
